title: Cyber Apocalypse CTF 2025
description:
Team H-T8 participated in Cyber Apocalypse CTF 2025: Tales from Eldoria and secured 345th position out of 8100+ teams. The team solved 51 out of 77 flags in total and did 36 challenges out of 62.

Strongest categories where the team solved all of the challenges were: AI, Coding, OSINT.

description: Team H-T8 participated in SekaiCTF 2025 and secured 198th position out of 2289 teams. Total points scored was 378.

title: Holmes CTF 2025
description: Team H-T8 participated in Holmes CTF 2025 and secured 211th position out of 7084 teams. Team solved all 5/5 challenges, got 65/65 flags and scored 8975 points.
